org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
echo -e ">>> Check if phpnode container is running and stop it..." phpnode=`docker container ls -a | grep phpnode | wc -l` if [ "$phpnode" -eq "1" ]; then docker container stop phpnode docker container rm phpnode fi
echo -e ">>> Start new phpnode container..." cd /vagrant/dockerGitRepo/php sed -i 's/dob-mysql/dbnode/g' /vagrant/dockerGitRepo/site/index.php docker image build -t phpcontainer . docker container run -d --name phpnode -p 9000:9000 -v /vagrant/dockerGitRepo/site:/site --link dbnode:dbnode phpcontainer
